column4: is it possible to install gnome-panel on a commandline install system without nautilus and the whole rest of gnome?
I imagine you'd have to install Xorg and suchlike as well and the backend GNOME stuff for the panels as well
ged0: Telling us what is actually wrong MIGHT help. i.e. an error message
xorg is fine, and backend gnome stuff is fine too. but i dont want metacity/nautilus etc considering i dont want to use them
